name: pnp-list-formatting-roll-dice
title: Roll Dice
shortDescription: This sample format provides a simulation of a game where a random number (between 1 and 6) is generated and displayed as a die. The value makes the progress bar advance with the associated emoji until the value 0 is reached and the winner emoji appears.
longDescription: This sample format provides a simulation of a game where a random number (between 1 and 6) is generated and displayed as a die. The value makes the progress bar advance with the associated emoji until the value 0 is reached and the winner emoji appears.

references.name: Use view formatting to customize SharePoint
references.description: You can use view formatting to customize how items in SharePoint lists and libraries are displayed. To do this, you construct a JSON object that describes the elements that are displayed when an item is loaded in a view and any styles to be applied to those elements.
